mapper.insert: insert into gollum_store (`type`, brand_id, `name`, location_code, address, mobile_phone, manager, lng, lat, create_time) values (#{type}, #{brandId}, #{name}, #{locationCode}, #{address} , #{mobilePhone}, #{manager}, #{lng} , #{lat}, current_timestamp);
mapper.update: update gollum_store set data_status = 0 where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select * from gollum_store gs where gs.brand_id = #{brandId};
